name: Snake Survival
description:
My submission to the Rune Game Jam. Tap the left side of the screen to turn counter-clockwise, and the right side of the screen to turn clockwise. Your score is visible on the top left.

Feedback:

Border around the screen (Celestial Tater) - done

Lines shouldn't split the screen in half (Celestial Tater) - done

Combo system for faster growth (Logix Indie) - done
